Programme Specific Outcome: On completion of the programme, students will have acquired the following capabilities/graduate attributes:
why_choose: Why choose this course? Research/Industry-Based Capstone Projects Hands-on experience through Practice Teaching Student-led Conferences Competitive Exam Support Community and Industry Internships Network with Scholars and Industry Professionals
what_learn: What you will learn? Acquire an advanced understanding of conceptual and methodological frameworks in English and Cultural Studies and stay updated in the area. Gain a nuanced understanding of issues relevant to technologically mediated social life and acquire digital literacy skills relevant to today's digital world. Enhance research skills and enable hands-on learning experience through on-field research and industry-focused Capstone Projects. Promote sustainable environmental practices, biodiversity, and inclusivity, through dedicated research and outreach efforts. Cultivate skills for a successful career and lifelong learning through practice-based courses, conferences, workshops &  internships. Navigate social and professional challenges through involvement in academic activities as well as community engagement project
